channel.title: Music – Willie Nelson

item.title: Willie Nelson - Always On My Mind
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Mark James, Johnny Christopher, Wayne Carson Thompson
KY: 2463 / KY: 7453

Maybe I didn’t
love you
quite as often as
I could have and
maybe I didn’t
treat you
quite as good as
I should have
If I made you feel
second best girl
I’m sorry I was blind
You were always
on my mind
you were always
on my mind
And maybe I didn’t
hold you
All those lonely
lonely times
And I guess
I never told you
I’m so happy that
you’re mine
Little things
I should have said
and done
I just never took
the time
You were always
on my mind
you were always
on my mind
Tell me
tell me
that your sweet love
hasn’t died
Give me
give me
one more chance to
keep you satisfied
I’ll keep you
satisfied-

If I made you feel
second best girl
I’m sorry I was blind
You were always
on my mind
you were always
on my mind
You were always
on my mind
you were always
on my mind-
